description: Title of the link management section in team details page
Helper text for link management switcher when workspace has RSS newsletters configured
defaultMessage: Link engagement analytics: Link shortening is used to record the number of times the link was clicked by users when distributed through a report or a newsletter.

description: Additional helper text for link management describing link length
defaultMessage: Link length and RSS: Link shortening makes URLs a predictable length. If you are using an RSS feed, the link service cannot be disabled. Learn more about link shortening.

description: Label for a switch where the user toggles link management in team details page
defaultMessage: Enable link shortening and engagement analytics

description: Placeholder for the optional UTM code text field
defaultMessage: Leave blank to disable UTM codes.

description: Helper text for UTM code field
defaultMessage: Customize the UTM code appended to the links. Leave blank to disable UTM codes. Use UTM codes to track article analytics. Learn more about UTM codes.

description: Text displayed in the content of a warning box on team details page when link shortening is on
Text displayed in the title of a warning box on team details page when link shortening is on
defaultMessage: All links sent via Check will be rewritten.
